endpoint.name: Description
endpoint.value: The HTTP endpoint for OPC API operations.

identity_domain.name: Description
identity_domain.value: The OPC identity domain for API operations

max_retry_timeout.name: Description
max_retry_timeout.value: Max num seconds to wait for successful response when operating on resources within OPC (defaults to 3000)

password.name: Description
password.value: The user password for OPC API operations.

user.name: Description
user.value: The user name for OPC API operations.
